segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a typical day so well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in daylight, highlighting the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my, the faucet's on and the sink's overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming right where she's standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbing the stool catches my eye next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks unstable, ready to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad thinking about possible accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view adds a serene touch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, unaware of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a blend of calm and impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
